amendment.description: Amendment provides for up to $5,000 in loan forgiveness for individuals that have completed a baccalaureate or an advanced degree and are willing to serve 5 consecutive years in public service.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 109-399 to expand loan relief in areas of national need to include qualified public service employees.
